hats.title: Cotton Twill Army Cap
hats.details: This selection from Kangol is a classic military influenced cap that adds the fashionable urban flair that only this iconic brand can provide. It has a hidden pocket on the inside in the top panel, adding a new layer to the phrase keep it under your hat, and the patented Flexfit headband means this cap is always easy to wear & comfortable.

comments.name: Gustavo Guerrero
comments.title: Awesome
comments.message: I love this hat, It's all my style!

comments.name: Amelia Brown
comments.title: Extraordinary
comments.message: Incredible quality and perfect figure

comments.title: Nice
comments.message: It's all that I expected, but the hat went one day late.

comments.title: Wow!
comments.message: The product is incredible, I want to buy more!

comments.title: Perfect
comments.message: The product is incredible, but the hat went two days late

hats.title: Denim Flexfit Army Cap
hats.details: The Denim Flexfit Army Cap is a classic military style cap in stretch Denim. It has a hidden pocket on the inside in the top panel, so you really can keep it under your hat. The patented Flexfit headband means the hat is easy to wear & comfortable.

hats.title: Washed Bucket Hat
hats.details: The Washed Bucket Hat is the perfect wardrobe accessory for a clean and timeless look for all seasons. It features 100% lightweight cotton material, a flat crown, a 2 1/4 brim, and cross-hatching on the embroidered kangaroo logo that adds definition to complete the iconic Kangol look. It’s available in several colors to reflect the current season and your current mood.

hats.title: Textured Wool Army Cap
hats.details: The Textured Wool Army Cap is a military-grade style cap with unique classic styling and balanced design. This wool-blend cap features a flexible stretch canvas fabric on both side and back panels. The cap’s front and peak panel feature a twill textured weave. The cap also features the FlexFit stretch technology on the sweatband that makes it comfortable and easy to wear.

hats.title: Bermuda Casual
hats.details: The Bermuda Casual is an original icon that’s been making an unforgettable impression on the beach and the dancefloor alike for generations. The Casual shape in Kangol proprietary textured Bermuda material is a classic Kangol® style.

hats.title: KANGOL x mastermind JAPAN
hats.details: The KANGOL x mastermind JAPAN FAUXFUR BASEBALL is a cut & sew style made of a luxurious & soft faux fur. It is finished with the iconic Mastermind logo on the front & Kangol logo on the back.

hats.title: Iridescent Baseball
hats.details: The Iridescent Baseball by Kangol is sure to be a festival favorite and a way to stay stylish while on the go. Based on Kangol's classic baseball fit, the Iridescent is crafted from an ultra modern material that is water repellent.

hats.title: Tech Flexfit Cap
hats.details: The Tech Flexfit Cap by Kangol is the best selling Flexfit baseball cap that features a light reflective tech fabric along the brim edge and within the Kangol logo. The baseball cap is finished with a Flexfit sweatband for ultimate comfort and fit.

hats.title: 3D Wool Flexfit Baseball
hats.details: If you’re looking for a classic baseball hat shape, the 3D Wool Flexfit baseball cap is the perfect choice for you. Discover a comfortable fit for your head as well as unique design features that make this hat stand out! With beautiful embroidery to rival even the highest quality hats, the iconic Kangol kangaroo practically hops off the crown and onto the brim. Run your fingers over the three-dimensional stitching and enjoy wearing this hat with every casual outfit.

hats.title: Tie Dye Baseball
hats.details: Show your love for classic fits with the Kangol Tie-Dye Baseball cap. This lightweight summer hat features a 6-panel crown made with durable cotton, all colored in a tie-dye print with the iconic Kangol logo embroidered on the center front. Its adjustable back strap ensures it will fit most head sizes and hairstyles. No matter who you are, this cap was made to make sure your summer stays fresh and fun.

hats.title: Faux Fur Beret
hats.details: The Faux Fur Beret has an oversize fit in an ultra plush faux fur that you won't want to let go of. The band is finished in a faux leather for a luxe feel and will look great on top of any outfit.

hats.title: Monty® Wool Beret
hats.details: Field Marshal Montgomery for whom the hat is named wore a Kangol® Beret as he commanded Allied troops in World War II. This Kangol® military beret has made a fashionable transition from the battlefield to the streets.

hats.title: 2-Tone Bermuda Jax Beret

hats.title: Modelaine Beret
hats.details: The beret is the first item Kangol® ever made. The Modelaine Beret uses the same processes as the founders did in 1938 to make the finest wool beret available.This style is a One Size Fits Most that fits closer to a Medium / 56cm. As seen in Vogue and InStyle magazine. Seen online at POPSUGAR.

hats.title: Wool Jax Beret
hats.details: The Wool Jax Beret has impressions creating 8 quartered panels on the crown with a fillet at the base. The volume of the beret means that it can be styled in multiple ways. It can also be worn with the Kangaroo logo at the front or the back.
